PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
_BcAccessReq_t Struct Reference

#include <sysEvents.h>

Data Fields

BcAction_t action
const void * context
uintptr_t denied

Detailed Description

Type of data which is passed as the data parameter into an event handler of the BC_EVENT_ACCESS_REQUEST event. An initiator must initialize all fields of the structure before calling of the SYS_PostEvent() function.

Definition at line 379 of file sysEvents.h.

Field Documentation

BcAction_t _BcAccessReq_t::action

An action for which permissions are requested.

Definition at line 382 of file sysEvents.h.

const void* _BcAccessReq_t::context

The pointer to a parameter's structure which are associated with the action.

Definition at line 384 of file sysEvents.h.

uintptr_t _BcAccessReq_t::denied

The result of access request. The value 0 means the action is permitted, any other values mean access denied. The initiator must write a default value.

Definition at line 387 of file sysEvents.h.
